cognizent-000419126012.title: Sr. Associate - Projects
cognizent-000419126012.descriptionTeaser: seek review from peer / Senior Developer periodically. 'Review build and deployment instructions. Facilitate automation for build and deployment. Facilitate building of tools/process for quick and efficient...
cognizent-000419126012.description1: <div><p><b>App Security Architect</b></p><p><b>Qualification</b>:</p>BE graduate<ul><li> MCA graduate.</li></ul><p><b>Responsibility</b>:</p><p><b>Requirements Gathering</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Understand functional and non functional application security requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Raise queries and seek clarification.</li></ul><ul><li> Use requirement gathering techniques like Interviews  Focus groups  Facilitated workshops to collect more information security requirements and refine them.</li></ul><p><b>Design & Analysis</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Identify areas that need to be validated using POC and drive it.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct and facilitate idea generation techniques like brainstroming  benchmarking  alternatives generation to come up with exhaustive and ideal design.</li></ul><ul><li> Create design documents   LLD HLD etc.</li></ul><p><b>Coding</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Monitor and review installation and configuration of application and data security products  data repository product(ldap) and configure replication.</li></ul><ul><li> For enabling parallel development of custom component  create skeleton/framework using which implementation will be done by Security Engineers.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct code review  ensure code quality and standard  continous integration is done.</li></ul><ul><li> Clarify questions / resolve issues / concerns on time.</li></ul><ul><li> seek review from peer / Senior Developer periodically.</li></ul><ul><li> Highlight any potential risks to Leads and seek inputs to resolve issues identified.</li></ul><ul><li> Update traceability matrix for the work package developed.</li></ul><ul><li> provide support on process audit activities.</li></ul><ul><li> Adhere to process and tools.</li></ul><ul><li> follow the SCM policies set for project.</li></ul><p><b>Testing</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Create unit test plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Review unit test cases.</li></ul><ul><li> Review unit test results.</li></ul><p><b>Documentation</b>:</p><ul><li> Develop SDLC lifecycle artifacts based on customer SDLC process.</li></ul><p><b>Change Management</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Review build and deployment instructions.</li></ul><ul><li> Schedule and review change requests.</li></ul><ul><li> Deployment.</li></ul><ul><li> Facilitate automation for build and deployment.</li></ul><ul><li> Facilitate building of tools/process for quick and efficient validation of application pre/post deployment (sanity checks).</li></ul><p><b>Defect Management</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Analyze defects (identify dependencies between application/components  alternate fixes  etc).</li></ul><ul><li> Review defect fixes.</li></ul><ul><li> Ensure defect density is low  defect leakage is null and first time right metric is high.</li></ul><p><b>Coaching & Facilitating</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Build induction training  conduct and facilitate.</li></ul><ul><li> Facilitate knowledge sharing within and among team through sessions.</li></ul><ul><li> Encourage team to take up domain/technical certifications.</li></ul><p><b>Project Estimation</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Technical inputs for estimation.</li></ul><ul><li> Do project estimation for project enhancements and mid size new projects.</li></ul><p><b>Resource/ Efforts Estimation and Monitoring</b>:</p><ul><li> Provide bottom up estimation for work packages.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide input to Security architect on dependencies between work packages.</li></ul><p><b>Process Improvements and Adherence</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Identify areas where automation/improvements can be done  develop accelerators to improve efficiency and productivity.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify pain points/gaps in process and suggest improvements.</li></ul><p><b>Knowledge Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Contribute towards updating knowledge assets and reviweing user manual  online help document  installation manual / scripts.</li></ul><ul><li> Contribute / search / reuse all types of assets from repository.</li></ul><p><b>People management</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Resolve conflicts within team.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct periodic 1 on 1 to provide and receive feedback.</li></ul><p><b>Business Development</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Technical support required for drafting solution response.</li></ul><p><b>Solution Design & Development</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Create Design documents   LLD  HLD.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform POC for solution realization based on technology skills.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>Java Script</li></ul><ul><li>J2EE</li></ul>

cognizent-000419127115.title: Associate - Projects
cognizent-000419127115.descriptionTeaser: Configure policies/process/workflows within the tool inline with the identify and access requirements of the customer. Develop custom components/connectors using languages such as java/NET for custom requirements....
cognizent-000419127115.description1: <div><p><b>App Security Specialist</b></p><p><b>Qualification</b>:</p>BE graduate<ul><li> MCA graduate.</li></ul><p><b>Responsibility</b>:</p><p><b>Requirements Gathering</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Understand functional and non functional application security requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Raise queries and seek clarification.</li></ul><p><b>Design & Analysis</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Develop proof of concept.</li></ul><ul><li> Understand dependency between applications/components vs design specification and raise clarification.</li></ul><p><b>Coding</b>:</p><ul><li> Install and configure Identity and access management product (admin and client components).</li></ul><ul><li> Install data repository product(ldap) and configure replication.</li></ul><ul><li> Create or update DIT(directory information tree)  object class  schema definition and indexes.</li></ul><ul><li> Create or update attribute configuration  search base configuration  Attribute access control  AAC filter.</li></ul><ul><li> Configure policies/process/workflows within the tool inline with the identify and access requirements of the customer.</li></ul><ul><li> Develop custom components/connectors using languages such as java/NET for custom requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Raise clarifications / issues / concerns regarding work output to the lead on time.</li></ul><ul><li> seek review from peer / Senior Developer periodically.</li></ul><ul><li> rework on the code based on code review / defects raised in unit testing or any other relevant testing phases.</li></ul><ul><li> participate in code peer review  as required.</li></ul><ul><li> Highlight any potential risks to the Leads and seek inputs to resolve issues identified.</li></ul><ul><li> support integration of components  as required.</li></ul><ul><li> Update traceability matrix for the work package developed.</li></ul><ul><li> provide support on process audit activities.</li></ul><ul><li> Adhere to process and tools.</li></ul><ul><li> follow the SCM policies set for project.</li></ul><p><b>Testing</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Develop unit test cases/suite.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform unit testing  log results  share defect details.</li></ul><p><b>Documentation</b>:</p><ul><li> Develop SDLC lifecycle artifacts based on customer SDLC process.</li></ul><p><b>Change Management</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Create build and deployment instructions.</li></ul><ul><li> Raise change request.</li></ul><p><b>Deployment</b>:</p><ul><li> Develop scripts for build and deployment automation.</li></ul><ul><li> Develop Deployment instructions.</li></ul><p><b>Defect Management</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Address code review comments.</li></ul><ul><li> Address defects raised during testing.</li></ul><p><b>Coaching & Facilitating</b>:</p><ul><li> Providing basic level training to entry level trainees on technologies/products used in the project.</li></ul><p><b>Process Improvements and Adherence</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Develop accelerators to improve efficiency and productivity.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify pain points/gaps in process and suggest improvements.</li></ul><p><b>Knowledge Management</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Contribute towards updating knowledge assets  user manual  online help document  installation manual / scripts.</li></ul><ul><li> Contribute / search / reuse all types of assets from repository.</li></ul><p><b>Solution Design & Development</b>:</p><ul><li> 'Develop POC's for solution design realization.</li></ul><ul><li> Create System Design document based on the solution architecture proposed by Leads.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>Java Script</li></ul><ul><li>J2EE</li></ul>

cognizent-000413418530.title: Sr. Associate - Projects
cognizent-000413418530.descriptionTeaser: ? Bring knowledge and understand trends, business/technology best practices, needs and guide/advise existing engagements/give inputs to planning process across people, process, technology and data solutions/recommendations...
cognizent-000413418530.description1: <div><p><b>Functional Architect</b></p><p><b>Qualification</b>:</p>B Tech/ MBA/ CA/ (BCom + MCom) or equivalent industry experience<p><b>Responsibility</b>:</p>Sales Support<ul><li> ? Contribute to Account Mining & Penetration efforts with active participation in customer planning process, including strategic planning phase vs execution phase.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Drive RFP Response & Improving Quality of Response (more business value focused), structures solutions in terms of scoping, effort.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Work with SME groups across domains/products to provide a complete end to end solution, including estimates and definition of critical factors, assumptions, and risks.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Contribute to transformational and consulting deals vs staff augmentation.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Drive oral presentations to the customers in area of domain/product expertise.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Support revenue generation and be considered a FINDER.</li></ul><ul><li> Market Scan and Brand Building.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Bring working knowledge of customer business domain and/or product  within a specific industry vertical/domain.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Conduct secondary research on domain/industry specific solutions.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Bring an understanding of competitive landscape.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify key trends and forecasts in the given area of domain/industry.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Prepare collateral, publications, technology papers etc for distribution.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Work with account teams to develop and deliver new logos.</li></ul><ul><li> Opportunity Identification.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Work on opportunity identification, prioritization and input to the qualification process.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Contribute to GTM activities with partners, vendors, industry analysts etc through active mindshare gain  Webinars, White papers, speaking events etc.</li></ul><ul><li> Knowledge Management.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Contribute to TL, Design, PoVs, tools, templates, case studies etc artifacts into the knowledge management repository.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Ensure all engagement artifacts are stored on knowledge repositories.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct quality review of KM artifacts prior to posting.</li></ul><ul><li> Requirement Gathering and Gap Analysis.</li></ul><ul><li> ? 'Lead  Requirement Gathering Workshops.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Lead FitGap exercise and come up with the FitGap document.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Come up with high level solution for identified gaps.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Present FitGap Assessment of a process area based on his/her area of expertise.</li></ul><ul><li> Project Support.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Active involvement and ownership of The Requirements and Solution.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Design Phase of small to medium sized delivery engagements.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Creating business blueprint for small to medium sized engagements.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Identifying gaps and recommending development/process changes.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Validate system configuration design, creation of test scenarios, migration plans.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Provide engagement oversight in areas of specialization as and when called upon.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Monitor AVM SLAs, address ticket resolution escalations, and drive bestinclass process adaptation.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Client Expectation Management.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Deliver and measure value  pre, during, & post delivery engagements.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Ensure client satisfaction.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Help customers execute organizational change programs.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Develop quality deliverables with focus on qualitative and quantitative business case, value props, roadmap, ROI analysis etc.</li></ul><ul><li> Client Management/Relationship Management.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Support brand building activities.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Proactively develop relationships with functional owners from the business in a process area.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Navigate client's organization to identify the right sponsors for a given solution.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Support Expectation Management, Client Satisfaction Management, and Risk Management.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Deliver and measure value pre, during, and post engagement and communicate to stakeholders.</li></ul><ul><li> People Management.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Active participation in recruitment activities  identify and hire.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Coaching &  Mentoring functional leads.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Conducting midyear and YEA feedback sessions.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Goal and expectation setting for new and existing resources.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Motivate through rewards and recognition, organize team events/initiatives.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Conduct Performance Management Reviews.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Demonstrate understanding and skillful handling of people issues.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Identify skill gaps and create training courses around domain/product areas.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Work with the Academy to plan the training calendar.</li></ul><ul><li> Business Planning.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Bring knowledge and understand trends, business/technology best practices, needs and guide/advise existing engagements/give inputs to planning process across people, process, technology and data solutions/recommendations in a particular functional area (domain/technology/product/ infrastructure).</li></ul><ul><li> Solution Conceptualization.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Identify pain areas, opportunities and potential solution offerings by industry/domain with business impact.</li></ul><ul><li> ? contribute to new solution development, develop transformation tools and templates, productivity enhancement solutions/product ideation.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Lead new solution offerings development by identifying/defining use cases, writing process blueprints and walkthroughs & collaborate with technology partners/support architects for offering development.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Define and communicate business/technology solutions in language meaningful to stakeholders in the engagement, such as CBA, ROI, and IRR.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>Java Springboot</li></ul><ul><li>Microservices.NET</li></ul><ul><li>Microservices</li></ul><ul><li>COTS Products(BFS Ast&Wlth)</li></ul>

cognizent-00040660011.title: Sr. Associate - Projects
cognizent-00040660011.descriptionTeaser: Test Requirements. Identify the preliminary test data requirements. Create automation test scripts if required. Identify the test data sources based on the analysis of the requirements. Identify the test...
cognizent-00040660011.description1: <div><p><b>Not Applicable</b></p><p><b>Qualification</b>:</p>Bachelors in science , engineering or equivalent<p><b>Responsibility</b>:</p><p><b>Knowledge Transition </b>:</p><ul><li> Understand the highlevel requirements and customer technology landscape (ETL/ BI tools) through review of documents (eg Component Design Document/ Requirements document).</li></ul><ul><li> Document the understanding as part of the reverse KT.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek signoff from the client.</li></ul><ul><li> Partner with the Business Analyst  to provide suggestions on the requirements to drive clarity based on experience in earlier projects.</li></ul><ul><li> Update/Review KT documents created by Test  Analyst.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek review of updated documents with Business Analyst.</li></ul><ul><li> Create an induction manual and share it with the onsite on need basis.</li></ul><p><b>Test Requirements </b>:</p><ul><li> Study  Organize and drive the requirement walkthrough session.</li></ul><ul><li> Analyze the requirements and brainstorm with the team to identify the gaps.</li></ul><ul><li> Validate the requirements for testability.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify the preliminary test data requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek clarification on requirement if any and update the clarification tracker with the same.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare/Review the data flow diagrams.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek clarification on the requirements from the customer and participate in the requirement discussion with the customer , if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform Proof of concepts or evaluate different tools( ETL/BI Tools) if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare high level flow documents, if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Document of understanding and Requirement Traceability Matrix based on further inputs received from the customer during the study phase.</li></ul><ul><li> Share updated documents with the stakeholders.</li></ul><ul><li> Followup on query logs & ensure inputs from query logs are incorporated into KT documents.</li></ul><ul><li> EIM QA : Seek inputs from the stakeholders on the data sources and the quality of data.</li></ul><ul><li> Gather inputs on the data source analysis and data profiling results  from the client.</li></ul><ul><li> Understand the impact of data quality on the already captured requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Participate in the business data mapping meetings to understand the requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Participate in the data quality meeting to understand the requirements related to data cleansing.</li></ul><ul><li> BI  Coordinate with the EIM QA team in case of any discrepancy in the data quality.</li></ul><p><b>Test Planning </b>:</p><ul><li> Provide inputs to the Test Lead to create test strategy (that includes release date, types of testing, scope of the project,  detail explanation of particular release, risk etc).</li></ul><ul><li> Gather inputs from the client (eg Types of testing, Development teams, Client managers etc).</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare test plan covering timelines, resource (Man /Machine) deployment (How it will be tested).</li></ul><ul><li> Seek signoff on the test plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide Test Environment Requests.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify need for test automation along with Test Lead.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs exit/entry criteria and the functionality to be tested.</li></ul><ul><li> Incorporate the previous learning from the earlier test cases in the current test plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs from EIM data quality.</li></ul><p><b>EIM QA</b>:</p>Test the data quality and share the inputs with BI QA<p><b>BI QA</b>:</p>Based on the inputs gathered from EIM QA, update the test strategy if required<p><b>Test Design </b>:</p><ul><li> Identify the test scenarios based on the understanding of systems, interfaces and application.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify end to end business critical scenarios.</li></ul><ul><li> Create/Review the test scenarios (created by the  Test Analyst) and RTM.</li></ul><ul><li> Validate with BA to ensure comprehensiveness.</li></ul><ul><li> Participate in customer review meetings if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Based on the changes in the requirement, identify/create  regression scenario and the impacted areas if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Review the test cases as created by Test Analyst.</li></ul><ul><li> If required, provide Test Case walkthrough and seek customer sign off inclusive of Prioritization of Test cases, Optimization options.</li></ul><ul><li> Create/ review  test scripts.</li></ul><ul><li> Share test scripts with the Test Lead.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify and validate test scenarios for automation.</li></ul><ul><li> Create automation test scripts if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Share created test scripts with Test Lead for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct pilot automation test run to validate the test scripts.</li></ul><ul><li> Upload the test cases in the test management tool (eg QC).</li></ul><ul><li> EIM QA   Identify the  reconciliation framework points for the ETL testing.</li></ul><p><b>Test Development </b>:</p><ul><li> Identify the test data sources based on the analysis of the requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify the test data requirements to ensure test coverage  and share  the same with the  Test Analyst.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek approval from the stakeholders on the same.</li></ul><p><b>Test Execution/Functional Testing </b>:</p><ul><li> Test the defect and update the status, if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform high level/Sanity testing to ensure testing is intact.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify defects and log failures.</li></ul><ul><li> Track defects (defect log as generated from the QC tool) to closure.</li></ul><ul><li> Participate in the defect triages to gather evidence for defect identification on periodic basis for defect prioritization and fix.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct acceptance testing, if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Track defect metrics to ensure testing effectiveness as generated by QC tool.</li></ul><ul><li> Track  # of test cases executed as part of the daily tracker to ensure productivity.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide automation/white box and other NFR status to Test Lead.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct performance testing for ETL batches/ reporting.</li></ul><p><b>EIM QA</b>:</p>Validate the internal layers by the reconciliation model/ framework<p><b>Test Closure </b>:</p><ul><li> Prepare Test summary Report and share the same for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify learning from the projects.</li></ul><ul><li> If requested, participate in release management to share impact of production dates.</li></ul><ul><li> Periodically generate metrics based on the audience.</li></ul><p><b>Production Support QA / Production Validation </b>:</p><ul><li> Identify the known issues and   track it in the known issue tracker.</li></ul><ul><li> Share the same with the stakeholders.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct training for the new users if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Participate in knowledge transition from incumbent or development stakeholders, gather and maintain test inventory (test  scenarios, cases, scripts, Known issue tracker,  Regression suite details etc).</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct regression testing to approve minor enhancement and release etc.</li></ul><ul><li> Create a deviation document capturing challenges etc.</li></ul><ul><li> on need basis.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify data checks for production data Perform production data checks post production release or ongoing production data validation.</li></ul><ul><li> Collaborate with the  support analyst within AVM  team  to  support code development , test data preparation , test environment availability etc.</li></ul><p><b>Delivery Management </b>:</p><ul><li> Provide inputs on the test execution  metrics to the Test Lead.</li></ul><p><b>Knowledge Management </b>:</p><ul><li> Create and upload the reusable assets (like Application flow document etc) on the KM portal.</li></ul><ul><li> Review and Update  KM documents  (eg functional document for each release) as per the tool/application up gradation and customer/project needs.</li></ul><ul><li> Capture and document the business/ application levels requirements details  in WIKI that can be used for induction of new members to the project teams.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct KT for new team members.</li></ul><ul><li> Stakeholder/ Client management  Identify and track the risks along with the mitigation for closure.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare status reports (task planned for the current & next week, tasks accomplished, action items.</li></ul><ul><li> analysis resource workload etc).</li></ul><ul><li> Share information with the Test Lead  on the project health.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>Hadoop Testing</li></ul><p><b>Good To Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>Hive</li></ul><ul><li>ANSI SQL</li></ul>

Identify pain areas, opportunities and potential solution offerings by industry/domain with business impact.</li></ul><ul><li> ? contribute to new solution development, develop transformation tools and templates, productivity enhancement solutions/product ideation.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Lead new solution offerings development by identifying/defining use cases, writing process blueprints and walkthroughs & collaborate with technology partners/support architects for offering development.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Define and communicate business/technology solutions in language meaningful to stakeholders in the engagement, such as CBA, ROI, and IRR.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>Java Springboot</li></ul><ul><li>Microservices.NET</li></ul><ul><li>Microservices</li></ul><ul><li>COTS Products(BFS Ast&Wlth)</li></ul>

cognizent-00036970653.title: Sr. Associate - Projects
cognizent-00036970653.descriptionTeaser: ? Review test cases written by team Provide support for development of integration test cases as required. ? Review incident/problem/change management plan created by team. ? Provide support to specialists...
cognizent-00036970653.description1: <div id="ccarole" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: Black; line-height: 1.5;"><p id="heading" style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial; font-size: 20px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px">Technology Architect</p><br><p id="finalval" style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px">Qualification:</p>BE/ B Tech / Product certifications especially for Cloud products<br><br><p id="finalval" style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px">Responsibility:</p>Design<br>• ? Understand various functional and non functional requirements.<br>• ? Break down the requirements into smaller modules.<br>• ? Apply knowledge of product provided frameworks for effective design.<br>• ? Provide inputs for categorizing critical and noncritical requirements.<br>• ? Develop proof of concept.<br>• ? Implement key integration patterns using relevant integration technology.<br>• ? Understand implications of performance and security in solutions.<br>• ? Provide inputs in designing end to end solution from a technical perspective.<br>• ? Review and approve system architecture design.<br>• ? Expert knowledge of development lifecycles such as Agile methodologies.<br>• ? Present the architecture to customers and seek signoff.<br>• ? Work on specific test cases for technology intensive modules such as multicloud integrations, cloud security.<br>• Coding.<br>• ? Analyze allocated task and understand BRD, low level and high level design.<br>• ? Allocate modules to developers for coding.<br>• ? Provide guidance to developers and set standards.<br>• ? Understand and educate the team on the database concepts.<br>• ? Write efficient queries and understand logical and physical data models  ? Review pseudo codes written by developers and provide a go ahead for code development.<br>• ? Prepare for incremental code creation and unit testing.<br>• ? Oversee development process and update Project Manager on development progress.<br>• ? Identify future product version releases and implications on code.<br>• ? Use internal  reusable components or vendor specified accelerators for coding.<br>• ? Review final codes written by developers on adherence to standards/functionality and approve for testing.<br>• follow up with Developers to ensure integration of components (input / output).<br>• ? Troubleshoot critical technical issues.<br>• ? Address and resolve escalations related to critical technical issues.<br>• ? Prepare weekly/monthly reports on the project and share with client/Project Manager.<br>• Ensure all system builds are prepared on time.<br>• Testing.<br>• ? Review test cases written by team Provide support for development of integration test cases as required.<br>• ? Participate in defect triage meetings with the team and identify actions to reduce defects.<br>• ? Include positive and negative test cases to check functionality.<br>• ? Check if peer review is completed at each step of test execution.<br>• ? Review, analyze and validate results.<br>• ? Follow up with team assigned for rework on code defects and close the same.<br>• align technical component testing with sprint methodologies of testing.<br>• ? Attend QA audits as and when required.<br>• ? Monitor system builds Signoff on test cases created by team.<br>• ? Discuss results / actions from NFR testing and signoff on the same for system testing / NFR.<br>• ? Collaborate with Cloud Success Managers on signoff of cloud custom components (as needed).<br>• ? Suggest and leverage automated testing tools for performance validation.<br>• Deployment Support and Closure.<br>• ? Create strategy for roll back.<br>• ? Conduct dry run on pilots.<br>• ? Monitor the processes are being followed.<br>• ? Document changes in the system.<br>• ? Resolve issues that arise during project deployment/ closure.<br>• ? Check that all action items mentioned in the deployment checklist have been completed.<br>• ? Post final acceptance, conduct all closure schedules.<br>• ? Provide support in creation of a final project report.<br>• ? Conduct handover to AVM team.<br>• ? Monitor all system/security administration activities and ensure all audit requirements are met.<br>• Service Support and Maintenance Release Management.<br>• ? Review incident/problem/change management plan created by team.<br>• ? Track issue/problem resolution.<br>• ? Conduct RCA.<br>• ? Define communication and issue resolution matrix.<br>• ? Drive and implement best practices for resolution of issues.<br>• ? Liaise with business users/SMEs to resolve issues if required.<br>• ? Review patch fixes created to prevent recurrence of complex problems ? Track adherence to SLAs.<br>• ? Guide team members in the course of incident/ problem management.<br>• ? Conduct change impact assessment.<br>• Collate change records.<br>• ? Share change records with relevant stakeholders.<br>• Knowledge Management.<br>• ? Create and update knowledge articles in the knowledge management repository.<br>• ? Provide guidance to team members to maintain all documentation related to project.<br>• ? Conduct KT sessions.<br>• ? Create knowledge articles on the problem, workaround solutions.<br>• Monitor and report the usage of knowledge articles.<br>• Maintain knowledge management database.<br>• Training and Recruitment / People Management.<br>• ? Provide assistance in selection of representative employee groups for training.<br>• ? Conduct training.<br>• Mentor team members in project teams with respect to product and domain skills on projects.<br>• ? Conduct technical, face to face interviews with candidates and support recruitment process.<br>• ? Set goals for team members and monitor performance.<br>• ? Coordinate with the project/program manager in understanding how the employee can better contribute to the project, seek feedback and address concerns.<br>• ? Conduct performance appraisal for team members.<br>• ? Organize team initiatives on a periodic basis.<br>• Project Planning and Set up.<br>• ? Understand resource plan.<br>• ? Plan for knowledge enrichment, change management and quality management.<br>• ? Conduct estimation of time utilization of different resources and activities ? Identify appropriate processes based on project landscape.<br>• ? Identify gaps and advise on improvements if required.<br>• ? Share inputs in creation of project plan with Project Manager.<br>• ? Review hardware/software requirement plan.<br>• ? Validate system build.<br>• Understand the test strategy, evaluate the design and identify gaps in the test plans, if any.<br>• ? Define KT plan.<br>• ? Customize project management system.<br>• ? Define standards and set Cognizant 20.<br>• ? Provide all support required during presales activities.<br>• Requirement Gathering and Analysis.<br>• ? Understand the requirements from clients/ functional consultants.<br>• ? Participate in client calls and seek clarifications.<br>• ? Relay information gathered to the team.<br>• ? Create a requirements traceability matrix.<br>• ? Provide inputs during creation of operational concepts and scenarios.<br>• ? Perform requirements feasibility with regards to testing and implementation.<br>• ?  Identify interface touch points, interfaces, and services requirements.<br>• ? Analyze NFRs.<br>• Solution Conceptualization.<br>• ? Participate / collaborate with Technology specialists in building solution POCs for identified minor components.<br>• ? Document solution design sections assigned Ensure accelerators / reusables are leveraged in the solutions built.<br>• Solution Definition and Design.<br>• ? Provide support to specialists during requirement gathering  (technical and infrastructure perspective during downstream assessment) to other teams.<br>• ? Interact with client to understand their requirements.<br>• ? Interact with domain/ product architects and provide requirements to design solution.<br>• ? Collaborate with delivery team to develop HLD/ functional design.<br>• ? Create infrastructure architecture for project based on the requirements.<br>• ?  Collaborate with product infrastructure teams to raise timely requests for instances / infra availability.<br>• Project Support.<br>• ? Conduct technical reviews and audits for checklists and work packages ? Report weekly status and walkthrough to the Project Manager / Client.<br>• ? Followup with customer POC to resolve team issues and any other dependencies.<br>• ? Work with cloud infra providers to address issues relating to performance, scalability.<br>• ? Raise concerns regarding changes in timelines with Client and facilitate resolution.<br>• ? Measure and report the actual effort against the estimated effort and ensure task progress reporting in C20.<br>• ? Technical lead will also lead conversations with cloud product vendors on roadmap / architecture discussions as needed by clients.<br>• Asset Development and Governance.<br>• ? Share ideas with Technical specialist on opportunity areas for asset / reusable / tools development.<br>• ? Provide inputs into challenges faced during development.<br></div>

cognizent-00041489782.title: Sr. Associate - Projects
cognizent-00041489782.descriptionTeaser: Share additional requirements identified with supervisor. Share the design document with the functional team post supervisor review. Guide the developers in identifying, preparing and conducting unit test...
cognizent-00041489782.description1: <div><p><b>Technical Lead</b></p><p><b>Qualification</b>:</p>Bachelor's in engineering or equivalent<p><b>Responsibility</b>:</p><p><b>Project Planning & Setup</b>:</p><ul><li> Understand and contribute to resource plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify appropriate processes based on project landscape.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify gaps and advise on improvements if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Share inputs in creation of project plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Contribute to hardware/software requirement plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Understand the test strategy, evaluate the design and identify gaps in the test plans, if any.</li></ul><p><b>Requirement Gathering and Analysis</b>:</p><ul><li> Analyze functional/non functional requirements and seek clarifications for better understanding of requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Define timeline estimates based on the requirements, complexity and inhouse capability.</li></ul><ul><li> Communicate estimates to supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs on technical feasibility of requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify gaps in requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Share additional requirements identified with supervisor.</li></ul><p><b>Design</b>:</p><ul><li> Guide team in preparation of technical specification document and review the same.</li></ul><ul><li> Break down the base lines requirements into business and functional requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare high level and low level design and share with supervisor for approval.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify tools and technologies to be used in the project as well as reusable objects that could be customized for the project.</li></ul><ul><li> Share the design document with the functional team post supervisor review.</li></ul><p><b>Coding</b>:</p><ul><li> Guide team in coding as per design.</li></ul><ul><li> Follow coding standards and best practices to check code quality.</li></ul><ul><li> Share developed code with supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Rework on the code based on inputs if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform complex integration.</li></ul><ul><li> Guide the developers in identifying, preparing and conducting unit test cases and fixing defects based on results.</li></ul><ul><li> Consolidate the test results and share with supervisor.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide periodic status update to supervisor and highlight / recommend any changes in design based on challenges faced.</li></ul><ul><li> Anticipate unreported defects and raise the same to supervisor.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct technical troubleshooting.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct reviews for codes created by team.</li></ul><p><b>Testing</b>:</p><ul><li> Coordinate with QA team during the testing phase.</li></ul><ul><li> Address queries raised by QA within defined timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct functional / non functional testing if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Investigate critical defects and establish need for fixing.</li></ul><ul><li> Fix complex defects identified during functional / non functional testing.</li></ul><ul><li> Understand the defect impact / criticality and handle accordingly.</li></ul><ul><li> Raise issues to leads/QA.</li></ul><ul><li> Report defect status as per project standard process within agreed timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Review defect fixes done by team guide them.</li></ul><ul><li> Fix defects identified during UAT within agreed timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Share revised code with supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Assist team lead and project manager on estimates around defect fixes.</li></ul><p><b>Deployment & Closure</b>:</p><ul><li> Conduct allocated transition tasks as per agreed timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Address queries / provide assistance in fixing issues during warranty period.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide prompt response during production support.</li></ul><ul><li> Fix defects as and when required.</li></ul><ul><li> Review defect fixes.</li></ul><ul><li> Maintain deployment tracker.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform sanity check post deployment to ensure smooth production.</li></ul><ul><li> Share activity status with supervisor and highlight concerns if any.</li></ul><p><b>Service Support & Maintenance</b>:</p><ul><li> Participate in scoping meetings and identify transition requirements for new projects.</li></ul><ul><li> Reconfirm requirements with relevant stakeholders.</li></ul><ul><li> Freeze SME calendar.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide transition activities.</li></ul><ul><li> Regularly track progress of transitions through weekly dashboards.</li></ul><ul><li> Attend user calls, and capture required information and incident details for logging.</li></ul><ul><li> Post information gathering, identify whether the incoming request is a service request or an incident.</li></ul><ul><li> Determine urgency and impact of the situation.</li></ul><ul><li> Assign appropriate priority to the incident.</li></ul><ul><li> Assign the incident to the right stakeholder for a workaround/fix.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct analysis on various incidents that occur frequently Categorize recurring incidents as problems/known errors.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide support to resolve these errors.</li></ul><ul><li> Initiate change management process.</li></ul><p><b>Knowledge Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Create specific artifacts for tasks allocated by supervisor.</li></ul><ul><li> Share artifact with supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Upload article in the knowledge management repository.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek inputs from knowledge repository to resolve problems.</li></ul><ul><li> Apply best practices/ learning during development activities.</li></ul><p><b>People Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Provide support in creation of training courses and supporting artifacts on the training server such as demo, presentation.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct training with the help of academy and mentoring with respect to domain.</li></ul><ul><li> Mentor new joiners in EAS function on an ongoing basis.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide support to various project managers in identification of training needs of their subordinates.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs during goal setting and performance appraisal.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>SAP MM - Integration with SD</li></ul><ul><li>SD Variant Configuration</li></ul><ul><li>SAP SD Testing</li></ul><ul><li>Billing and Revenue</li></ul><ul><li>Standard Order to Cash</li></ul>

cognizent-00040850531.title: Manager - Projects
cognizent-00040850531.descriptionTeaser: Share inputs in creation of project plan with Project Manager. Review final codes written by developers on adherence to standards/functionality and approve for testing. Review test cases written by team...

Analysis</b>:</p><ul><li> Understand the requirements from clients/ functional consultants.</li></ul><ul><li> Participate in client calls and seek clarifications.</li></ul><ul><li> Create a requirements traceability matrix.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs during creation of operational concepts and scenarios.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform requirements feasibility with regards to testing and implementation.</li></ul><ul><li> Analyze NFRs.</li></ul><p><b>Design</b>:</p><ul><li> Understand various functional and non functional requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Break down the requirements into smaller modules.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs for categorizing critical and noncritical requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs in designing end to end solution from a technical perspective.</li></ul><ul><li> Review and approve system architecture design.</li></ul><p><b>Coding</b>:</p><ul><li> Analyze allocated task and understand BRD, low level and high level design.</li></ul><ul><li> Allocate modules to developers for coding.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide guidance to developers and set standards.</li></ul><ul><li> Review pseudo codes written by developers and provide a go ahead for code development.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare for incremental code creation and unit testing.</li></ul><ul><li> Oversee development process and update Project Manager on development progress.</li></ul><ul><li> Review final codes written by developers on adherence to standards/functionality and approve for testing.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare weekly/monthly reports on the project and share with client/Project Manager.</li></ul><ul><li> Ensure all system builds are prepared on time.</li></ul><p><b>Testing</b>:</p><ul><li> Review test cases written by team Provide support for development of integration test cases as required.</li></ul><ul><li> Include positive and negative test cases to check functionality.</li></ul><ul><li> Check if peer review is completed at each step of test execution.</li></ul><ul><li> Review, analyze and validate results.</li></ul><ul><li> Follow up with team assigned for rework on code defects and close the same.</li></ul><ul><li> Attend QA audits as and when required.</li></ul><ul><li> Monitor system builds.</li></ul><p><b>Project Closure Activities</b>:</p><ul><li> Create strategy for roll back.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct dry run on pilots.</li></ul><ul><li> Monitor the processes are being followed.</li></ul><ul><li> Document changes in the system.</li></ul><ul><li> Resolve issues that arise during project deployment/ closure.</li></ul><ul><li> Check that all action items mentioned in the deployment checklist have been completed.</li></ul><ul><li> Post final acceptance, conduct all closure schedules.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide support in creation of a final project report.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct handover to AVM team.</li></ul><ul><li> Monitor all system/security administration activities and ensure all audit requirements are met.</li></ul><p><b>Service Support & Maintenance</b>:</p><ul><li> Review incident/problem/change management plan created by team.</li></ul><ul><li> Track issue/problem resolution.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct RCA.</li></ul><ul><li> Define communication and issue resolution matrix.</li></ul><ul><li> Drive and implement best practices for resolution of issues.</li></ul><ul><li> Liaise with business users/SMEs to resolve issues if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Review patch fixes created to prevent recurrence of complex problems.</li></ul><ul><li> Track adherence to SLAs.</li></ul><ul><li> Guide team members in the course of incident/ problem management.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct change impact assessment.</li></ul><ul><li> Collate change records.</li></ul><ul><li> Share change records with relevant stakeholders.</li></ul><p><b>Knowledge Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Create and update knowledge articles in the knowledge management repository.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide guidance to team members to maintain all documentation related to project.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct KT sessions.</li></ul><ul><li> Create knowledge articles on the problem, workaround solutions.</li></ul><ul><li> Monitor and report the usage of knowledge articles.</li></ul><ul><li> Maintain knowledge management database.</li></ul><p><b>People Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Provide assistance in selection of representative employee groups for training.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct training.</li></ul><ul><li> Mentor team members in project teams with respect to product and domain skills on projects.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct technical, face to face interviews with candidates and support recruitment process.</li></ul><ul><li> Set goals for team members and monitor performance.</li></ul><ul><li> Coordinate with the project/program manager in understanding how the employee can better contribute to the project, seek feedback and address concerns.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct performance appraisal for team members.</li></ul><ul><li> Organize team initiatives on a periodic basis.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>SuccessFactors-Marketing</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors - Learning</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors - Compensation</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors-Employ Central</li></ul><p><b>Good To Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>SucessFactors-Succession & Dev</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors - Recruiting</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors-Perf & Goals</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors Testing</li></ul>

Understand the requirements from clients/ functional consultants.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Participate in client calls and seek clarifications.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Relay information gathered to the team.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Create a requirements traceability matrix.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Provide inputs during creation of operational concepts and scenarios.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Perform requirements feasibility with regards to testing and implementation.</li></ul><ul><li> ?  Identify interface touch points, interfaces, and services requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Analyze NFRs.</li></ul><ul><li> Solution Conceptualization.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Participate / collaborate with Technology specialists in building solution POCs for identified minor components.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Document solution design sections assigned Ensure accelerators / reusables are leveraged in the solutions built.</li></ul><ul><li> Solution Definition and Design.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Provide support to specialists during requirement gathering  (technical and infrastructure perspective during downstream assessment) to other teams.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Interact with client to understand their requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Interact with domain/ product architects and provide requirements to design solution.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Collaborate with delivery team to develop HLD/ functional design.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Create infrastructure architecture for project based on the requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> ?  Collaborate with product infrastructure teams to raise timely requests for instances / infra availability.</li></ul><ul><li> Project Support.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Conduct technical reviews and audits for checklists and work packages ? Report weekly status and walkthrough to the Project Manager / Client.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Followup with customer POC to resolve team issues and any other dependencies.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Work with cloud infra providers to address issues relating to performance, scalability.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Raise concerns regarding changes in timelines with Client and facilitate resolution.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Measure and report the actual effort against the estimated effort and ensure task progress reporting in C20.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Technical lead will also lead conversations with cloud product vendors on roadmap / architecture discussions as needed by clients.</li></ul><ul><li> Asset Development and Governance.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Share ideas with Technical specialist on opportunity areas for asset / reusable / tools development.</li></ul><ul><li> ? Provide inputs into challenges faced during development.</li></ul></div><p><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>SAP FICO</li></ul><ul><li>NPD/NPI</li></ul>

cognizent-00040045035.title: Sr. Associate - Projects
cognizent-00040045035.descriptionTeaser: Share additional requirements identified with supervisor. Share the design document with the functional team post supervisor review. Guide the developers in identifying, preparing and conducting unit test...
cognizent-00040045035.description1: <font size="3" face="Arial"><div><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Technical Lead</b></p><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Qualification</b>:</p>Bachelor's in engineering or equivalent<p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Responsibility</b>:</p><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Project Planning & Setup</b>:</p><ul><li> Understand and contribute to resource plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify appropriate processes based on project landscape.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify gaps and advise on improvements if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Share inputs in creation of project plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Contribute to hardware/software requirement plan.</li></ul><ul><li> Understand the test strategy, evaluate the design and identify gaps in the test plans, if any.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Requirement Gathering and Analysis</b>:</p><ul><li> Analyze functional/non functional requirements and seek clarifications for better understanding of requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Define timeline estimates based on the requirements, complexity and inhouse capability.</li></ul><ul><li> Communicate estimates to supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs on technical feasibility of requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify gaps in requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Share additional requirements identified with supervisor.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Design</b>:</p><ul><li> Guide team in preparation of technical specification document and review the same.</li></ul><ul><li> Break down the base lines requirements into business and functional requirements.</li></ul><ul><li> Prepare high level and low level design and share with supervisor for approval.</li></ul><ul><li> Identify tools and technologies to be used in the project as well as reusable objects that could be customized for the project.</li></ul><ul><li> Share the design document with the functional team post supervisor review.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Coding</b>:</p><ul><li> Guide team in coding as per design.</li></ul><ul><li> Follow coding standards and best practices to check code quality.</li></ul><ul><li> Share developed code with supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Rework on the code based on inputs if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform complex integration.</li></ul><ul><li> Guide the developers in identifying, preparing and conducting unit test cases and fixing defects based on results.</li></ul><ul><li> Consolidate the test results and share with supervisor.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide periodic status update to supervisor and highlight / recommend any changes in design based on challenges faced.</li></ul><ul><li> Anticipate unreported defects and raise the same to supervisor.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct technical troubleshooting.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct reviews for codes created by team.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Testing</b>:</p><ul><li> Coordinate with QA team during the testing phase.</li></ul><ul><li> Address queries raised by QA within defined timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct functional / non functional testing if required.</li></ul><ul><li> Investigate critical defects and establish need for fixing.</li></ul><ul><li> Fix complex defects identified during functional / non functional testing.</li></ul><ul><li> Understand the defect impact / criticality and handle accordingly.</li></ul><ul><li> Raise issues to leads/QA.</li></ul><ul><li> Report defect status as per project standard process within agreed timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Review defect fixes done by team guide them.</li></ul><ul><li> Fix defects identified during UAT within agreed timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Share revised code with supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Assist team lead and project manager on estimates around defect fixes.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Deployment & Closure</b>:</p><ul><li> Conduct allocated transition tasks as per agreed timelines.</li></ul><ul><li> Address queries / provide assistance in fixing issues during warranty period.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide prompt response during production support.</li></ul><ul><li> Fix defects as and when required.</li></ul><ul><li> Review defect fixes.</li></ul><ul><li> Maintain deployment tracker.</li></ul><ul><li> Perform sanity check post deployment to ensure smooth production.</li></ul><ul><li> Share activity status with supervisor and highlight concerns if any.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Service Support & Maintenance</b>:</p><ul><li> Participate in scoping meetings and identify transition requirements for new projects.</li></ul><ul><li> Reconfirm requirements with relevant stakeholders.</li></ul><ul><li> Freeze SME calendar.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide transition activities.</li></ul><ul><li> Regularly track progress of transitions through weekly dashboards.</li></ul><ul><li> Attend user calls, and capture required information and incident details for logging.</li></ul><ul><li> Post information gathering, identify whether the incoming request is a service request or an incident.</li></ul><ul><li> Determine urgency and impact of the situation.</li></ul><ul><li> Assign appropriate priority to the incident.</li></ul><ul><li> Assign the incident to the right stakeholder for a workaround/fix.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct analysis on various incidents that occur frequently Categorize recurring incidents as problems/known errors.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide support to resolve these errors.</li></ul><ul><li> Initiate change management process.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Knowledge Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Create specific artifacts for tasks allocated by supervisor.</li></ul><ul><li> Share artifact with supervisor for review.</li></ul><ul><li> Upload article in the knowledge management repository.</li></ul><ul><li> Seek inputs from knowledge repository to resolve problems.</li></ul><ul><li> Apply best practices/ learning during development activities.</li></ul><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>People Management</b>:</p><ul><li> Provide support in creation of training courses and supporting artifacts on the training server such as demo, presentation.</li></ul><ul><li> Conduct training with the help of academy and mentoring with respect to domain.</li></ul><ul><li> Mentor new joiners in EAS function on an ongoing basis.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide support to various project managers in identification of training needs of their subordinates.</li></ul><ul><li> Provide inputs during goal setting and performance appraisal.</li></ul></div><p style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><b>Must Have Skills</b> </p><ul><li>SuccessFactors-Marketing</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors - Learning</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors - Compensation</li></ul><ul><li>SuccessFactors - Recruiting</li></ul></font>
